setup_script_description: sets focus on a link before the grid
specific_user_instruction: Navigate to the first column header in the grid. Note: you may need to press  certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the grid and the first column header.
output_assertions: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
Coordinates of the column header (column 1, row 1) are conveyed
